title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 432.5 - Increase in rates prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 432.5 - Increase in rates prohibited

State Regulations

No municipality furnishing gas, electric or steam service
shall, without special permission of this commission, so revise or amend its
rate schedules, in compliance with this Part, as to increase the rates for
service applicable to any customer as compared with the rates now in
effect. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
432.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
